AorTech will typically order all material at a rate which will compensate for shrinkage / yield losses.
24.0 TRANSFERABILITY 24.1 AorTech acknowledges that Novoste Corporation is in the process of forming its European corporate striucture, which ultimately may include subsidiaries in several countries in addition to Novoste B.V. in the Netherlands.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
3.10 During the performance of this manufacturing Agreement, AorTech will in accordance with Clause 3.4 purchase materials to support Novoste B.V. requirements.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Certain materials which AorTech will acquire will be subject to minimumbuy requirements and quantity price breaks which may result in excess material accumulation which will be the responsibility of Novoste B.V. provided Novoste B.V. has approved such purchases.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
b. AorTech will use its best effort to minimize the impact of excess material and/or obsolete materials.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
AorTech will return materials to suppliers for credit, less restocking fees, when appropriate.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
However, final costs associated with the accumulation of excess and obsolete materials are chargeable and payable by Novoste B.V.. Any excess or obsolete inventories will be charged to Novoste B.V. by AorTech at cost, without profit.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
3.11 Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for all costs incurred by Aortech on behalf of Novoste B.V. in carrying out its duties under this Agreement 4.0 INSPECTIONS 4.1 All facilities used by AorTech for the manufacture of the Product shall be open to inspection by Novoste B.V. or any governmental, local or other regulatory agency or authority, providing that AorTech receives reasonable written notice.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
5.0 BUSINESS REVIEWS 5.1 AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall, each at their own expense, meet periodically to review performance and business transacted, and to identify and resolve those issues which have arisen since the last business review meeting.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.0 PAYMENTS TO MANUFACTURER (AORTECH) 6.1 The initial price to be paid by Novoste B.V. to AorTech shall be calculated at the rate of $18 (United States currency) per hour (each such hour being referred to herein as a Direct Labor Assembly Hour) in respect of each hour or part of an hour which an AorTech employee shall devote to performing any of the following activities: manufacture of Novoste B.V.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.2 AorTech shall, in good faith, maintain written records (time sheets) for each individual assigned to work on Novoste B.V.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Product, whereby the number of hours worked, date work was performed, and name of individual performing the work shall be recorded.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
These records, as they apply to Novoste B.V.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.3 The price specified in clause 6.1 shall be increased annually with effect from the anniversary of the last date of execution hereof (a) in proportion to the increase (if any) in the Retail Prices Index published in the United Kingdom by the Department of Employment (or by any Government Department upon which its duties in connection with such Index shall have devolved) for the immediately preceding month of over that for the same month in 6 6 the preceding year, or (b) by 5% per annum, whichever shall be the higher.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.5 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech $5,000 (United States currency) per month for use of a class 100,000 cleanroom dedicated exclusively to manufacture the Product.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
In addition, the following services shall be included: a. the storage of materials within AorTech's warehouses area; this shall include up to 500 square feet of storage space.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.6 Novoste B.V. shall reimburse AorTech in respect of any capital expenditure necessarily incurred by AorTech with the prior Agreement of Novoste B.V., such Agreement not to be unreasonably withheld for the purpose of assembling the Product pursuant to this Agreement, including, without prejudice to the foregoing generality, any expenditure incurred in connection with the provision of new or additional cleanroom facilities.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
This amount shall not exceed $10,000 US dollars unless otherwise agreed by both parties in writing in advance.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.7 Novoste B.V. shall also pay to AorTech a fee of $30 US dollars, (together with all Value Added Tax payable thereon) in respect of each hour or part of an hour devoted by AorTech's senior technician.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $30 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $15) or $45 per hour.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
6.8 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech a fifteen percent (15%) fee based on the actual cost of materials purchased by AorTech, where such materials are exclusiverly used to build Novoste Product per this agreement (fee is equal to 15% of actual material costs).
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
This incremental material cost shall cover any administrative, finance or other costs incurred by AorTech to purchase materials required to build Novoste Product per this agreement.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
This incremental material cost shall be invoiced on a separate line item from that of actual material cost.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.

All freight costs relating to delivery of Product from AorTech's premises to their ultimate destination will be at the expense of Novoste B.V. and will be reimbursed by Novoste B.V. to AorTech within 30 days of a request for payment in writing by AorTech to Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. retains the right to approve the freight forwarder recommend by AorTech.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.

This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.

This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
8 8 7.3 Novoste B.V. shall pay for all transportation costs and any Value Added Tax as assigned in accordance with the terms in Clause 7.1.

All transit insurance costs in respect of onward delivery of finished goods to Novoste B.V.'s customers, will be the passed on to Novoste B.V. by AorTech.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
7.4 Novoste B.V. may require that shipments of Product under this Agreement be shipped by AorTech directly to Novoste B.V. customers.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
These shipment locations will be specified by Novoste B.V.. 7.5 During the initial preProduction stage (defined as the stage where equipment installation, Product qualification, process validation take place, and initial shelf stock units are built), AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall work together to develop a price per unit cost which includes the cost, facility overhead, direct and indirect labor, and sterilization costs.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Upon developing a mutually agreed upon price per unit, this manufacturing Agreement will be amended to reflect such terms.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Until such time pricing shall remain as indicated in section 6 of this Agreement.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
8.0 TERM 8.1 Subject to prior termination as provided in Section 9.1 below, the initial term of this Agreement shall be from the date of execution of this agreement until March 31st, 2000.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
8.2 After the initial term of this Agreement, the duration of this Agreement shall thereafter automatically renew for an additional twelve month period except that either Novoste B.V. or AorTech may terminate the Agreement by giving ninety (90) days prior written notice of termination, such termination to be effective at the end of the relevant twelve month period.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
AorTech will complete the manufacture of any Products ordered by Novoste B.V. up to the termination date.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. All costs associated with the transfer of equipment, documentation, records or other Novoste B.V. assets shall be expensed to Novoste B.V.. 9.3 With reference to Section 13 of this Agreement, if any of the conditions listed in Section 13 of this Agreement should occur, and the result of such condition represents a breach of this Agreement, this Agreement will terminate.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
10.0 CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION AND ADVERTISING 10.1 AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall each maintain as confidential, and not to disclose to third parties or use for its own benefit, any specifications, drawings, blueprints, flow charts, reports, data, business information, trade secrets, manufacturing processes, or other confidential information of the other party which AorTech or Novoste B.V., as the case may be, learns or acquires by virtue of this Agreement, except that AorTech or Novoste B.V. may disclose confidential information pursuant to the order or requirement of a court, administrative agency, or other governmental body, and for disclosures required to be made by Novoste B.V. or its parent, Novoste Corporation, pursuant to United States Securities Law.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
AorTech and Novoste B.V. must notify the other party in writing of the need for such disclosure in advance of any such disclosure being made and AorTech and Novoste B.V. further agree to use reasonable efforts to protect the confidential information against disclosure to unauthorized persons.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
10.3 Without Novoste B.V.'s written consent, AorTech shall not in any manner disclose (except as required for financing), advertise, nor publish the existence of this Agreement nor the terms of transactions under this Agreement, which shall be considered as part of the confidential information.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
10.4 The term confidential information shall not include information which is in the public domain at the time of disclosure or afterward, except where such information becomes public due to a breach by the disclosing party of its obligations hereunder, nor shall the term confidential information in possession at the time of disclosure or which may be disclosed by third party having the right to disclose the same.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.

23.0 WARRANTY 23.1 Limited Warranty: AorTech warrants to Novoste B.V., for the shelf life of the Product as defined by Novoste specifications, which shall be a minimum of twenty four months from the date of sterilization, and a maximum of thirtysix months from the date of sterilization, that all Product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship, and shall conform to applicable specifications, drawings, samples and descriptions referred to in this Agreement.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
23.2 AorTech shall rework or replace all defective Product (typically within 15 days of receipt) unless otherwise specified by Novoste B.V., at no cost to Novoste B.V.. All rework of finished Product must be approved in writing before starting any such rework by the Novoste B.V., Director of Quality Assurance.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.
23.3 AorTech warrants its right under this Agreement to convey the Product and that the Product is and will continue to be, upon delivery from AorTech, free of all liens and encumbrances.
This rate may from time to time be adjusted by Novoste B.V. provided such change is delivered to AorTech in writing.

23.0 WARRANTY 23.1 Limited Warranty: AorTech warrants to Novoste B.V., for the shelf life of the Product as defined by Novoste specifications, which shall be a minimum of twenty four months from the date of sterilization, and a maximum of thirtysix months from the date of sterilization, that all Product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship, and shall conform to applicable specifications, drawings, samples and descriptions referred to in this Agreement.
3.10 During the performance of this manufacturing Agreement, AorTech will in accordance with Clause 3.4 purchase materials to support Novoste B.V. requirements.

3.10 During the performance of this manufacturing Agreement, AorTech will in accordance with Clause 3.4 purchase materials to support Novoste B.V. requirements.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Certain materials which AorTech will acquire will be subject to minimumbuy requirements and quantity price breaks which may result in excess material accumulation which will be the responsibility of Novoste B.V. provided Novoste B.V. has approved such purchases.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
b. AorTech will use its best effort to minimize the impact of excess material and/or obsolete materials.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
AorTech will return materials to suppliers for credit, less restocking fees, when appropriate.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
However, final costs associated with the accumulation of excess and obsolete materials are chargeable and payable by Novoste B.V.. Any excess or obsolete inventories will be charged to Novoste B.V. by AorTech at cost, without profit.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

6.0 PAYMENTS TO MANUFACTURER (AORTECH) 6.1 The initial price to be paid by Novoste B.V. to AorTech shall be calculated at the rate of $18 (United States currency) per hour (each such hour being referred to herein as a Direct Labor Assembly Hour) in respect of each hour or part of an hour which an AorTech employee shall devote to performing any of the following activities: manufacture of Novoste B.V.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.
Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Novoste B.V. shall reimburse Aortech on request for the cost of all such materials.

Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.

These records, as they apply to Novoste B.V.

Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.

Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.

Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.

23.0 WARRANTY 23.1 Limited Warranty: AorTech warrants to Novoste B.V., for the shelf life of the Product as defined by Novoste specifications, which shall be a minimum of twenty four months from the date of sterilization, and a maximum of thirtysix months from the date of sterilization, that all Product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship, and shall conform to applicable specifications, drawings, samples and descriptions referred to in this Agreement.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
23.2 AorTech shall rework or replace all defective Product (typically within 15 days of receipt) unless otherwise specified by Novoste B.V., at no cost to Novoste B.V.. All rework of finished Product must be approved in writing before starting any such rework by the Novoste B.V., Director of Quality Assurance.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
23.3 AorTech warrants its right under this Agreement to convey the Product and that the Product is and will continue to be, upon delivery from AorTech, free of all liens and encumbrances.
Additionally, design changes may cause materials to become obsolete.
24.0 TRANSFERABILITY 24.1 AorTech acknowledges that Novoste Corporation is in the process of forming its European corporate striucture, which ultimately may include subsidiaries in several countries in addition to Novoste B.V. in the Netherlands.

Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.

Product, whereby the number of hours worked, date work was performed, and name of individual performing the work shall be recorded.

These records, as they apply to Novoste B.V.

Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
6.3 The price specified in clause 6.1 shall be increased annually with effect from the anniversary of the last date of execution hereof (a) in proportion to the increase (if any) in the Retail Prices Index published in the United Kingdom by the Department of Employment (or by any Government Department upon which its duties in connection with such Index shall have devolved) for the immediately preceding month of over that for the same month in 6 6 the preceding year, or (b) by 5% per annum, whichever shall be the higher.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.

Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.

Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $30 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $15) or $45 per hour.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
6.8 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech a fifteen percent (15%) fee based on the actual cost of materials purchased by AorTech, where such materials are exclusiverly used to build Novoste Product per this agreement (fee is equal to 15% of actual material costs).
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
This incremental material cost shall cover any administrative, finance or other costs incurred by AorTech to purchase materials required to build Novoste Product per this agreement.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
This incremental material cost shall be invoiced on a separate line item from that of actual material cost.
Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.

Obsolete materials due to a design change will be returned to suppliers when possible.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.

Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
6.3 The price specified in clause 6.1 shall be increased annually with effect from the anniversary of the last date of execution hereof (a) in proportion to the increase (if any) in the Retail Prices Index published in the United Kingdom by the Department of Employment (or by any Government Department upon which its duties in connection with such Index shall have devolved) for the immediately preceding month of over that for the same month in 6 6 the preceding year, or (b) by 5% per annum, whichever shall be the higher.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
6.5 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech $5,000 (United States currency) per month for use of a class 100,000 cleanroom dedicated exclusively to manufacture the Product.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
In addition, the following services shall be included: a. the storage of materials within AorTech's warehouses area; this shall include up to 500 square feet of storage space.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
6.6 Novoste B.V. shall reimburse AorTech in respect of any capital expenditure necessarily incurred by AorTech with the prior Agreement of Novoste B.V., such Agreement not to be unreasonably withheld for the purpose of assembling the Product pursuant to this Agreement, including, without prejudice to the foregoing generality, any expenditure incurred in connection with the provision of new or additional cleanroom facilities.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
This amount shall not exceed $10,000 US dollars unless otherwise agreed by both parties in writing in advance.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
6.7 Novoste B.V. shall also pay to AorTech a fee of $30 US dollars, (together with all Value Added Tax payable thereon) in respect of each hour or part of an hour devoted by AorTech's senior technician.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $30 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $15) or $45 per hour.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
6.8 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech a fifteen percent (15%) fee based on the actual cost of materials purchased by AorTech, where such materials are exclusiverly used to build Novoste Product per this agreement (fee is equal to 15% of actual material costs).
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
This incremental material cost shall cover any administrative, finance or other costs incurred by AorTech to purchase materials required to build Novoste Product per this agreement.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
This incremental material cost shall be invoiced on a separate line item from that of actual material cost.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
7.0 DELIVERY, LEAD TIME AND FLEXABILITY 7.1 AorTech shall arrange delivery of the Product to such destination as Novoste B.V. may designate in accordance with Clause 7.4.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
All freight costs relating to delivery of Product from AorTech's premises to their ultimate destination will be at the expense of Novoste B.V. and will be reimbursed by Novoste B.V. to AorTech within 30 days of a request for payment in writing by AorTech to Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. retains the right to approve the freight forwarder recommend by AorTech.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
7.2 Novoste B.V. will provide AorTech with a purchase order which shall state the Product part number, quantities and date required.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
AorTech shall use its best efforts to supplying the Product in accordance with Novoste B.V. required ship dates.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
8 8 7.3 Novoste B.V. shall pay for all transportation costs and any Value Added Tax as assigned in accordance with the terms in Clause 7.1.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
All transit insurance costs in respect of onward delivery of finished goods to Novoste B.V.'s customers, will be the passed on to Novoste B.V. by AorTech.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
7.4 Novoste B.V. may require that shipments of Product under this Agreement be shipped by AorTech directly to Novoste B.V. customers.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
These shipment locations will be specified by Novoste B.V.. 7.5 During the initial preProduction stage (defined as the stage where equipment installation, Product qualification, process validation take place, and initial shelf stock units are built), AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall work together to develop a price per unit cost which includes the cost, facility overhead, direct and indirect labor, and sterilization costs.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Upon developing a mutually agreed upon price per unit, this manufacturing Agreement will be amended to reflect such terms.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Until such time pricing shall remain as indicated in section 6 of this Agreement.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
8.0 TERM 8.1 Subject to prior termination as provided in Section 9.1 below, the initial term of this Agreement shall be from the date of execution of this agreement until March 31st, 2000.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
8.2 After the initial term of this Agreement, the duration of this Agreement shall thereafter automatically renew for an additional twelve month period except that either Novoste B.V. or AorTech may terminate the Agreement by giving ninety (90) days prior written notice of termination, such termination to be effective at the end of the relevant twelve month period.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
AorTech will complete the manufacture of any Products ordered by Novoste B.V. up to the termination date.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. All costs associated with the transfer of equipment, documentation, records or other Novoste B.V. assets shall be expensed to Novoste B.V.. 9.3 With reference to Section 13 of this Agreement, if any of the conditions listed in Section 13 of this Agreement should occur, and the result of such condition represents a breach of this Agreement, this Agreement will terminate.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
10.0 CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION AND ADVERTISING 10.1 AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall each maintain as confidential, and not to disclose to third parties or use for its own benefit, any specifications, drawings, blueprints, flow charts, reports, data, business information, trade secrets, manufacturing processes, or other confidential information of the other party which AorTech or Novoste B.V., as the case may be, learns or acquires by virtue of this Agreement, except that AorTech or Novoste B.V. may disclose confidential information pursuant to the order or requirement of a court, administrative agency, or other governmental body, and for disclosures required to be made by Novoste B.V. or its parent, Novoste Corporation, pursuant to United States Securities Law.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
AorTech and Novoste B.V. must notify the other party in writing of the need for such disclosure in advance of any such disclosure being made and AorTech and Novoste B.V. further agree to use reasonable efforts to protect the confidential information against disclosure to unauthorized persons.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
10.3 Without Novoste B.V.'s written consent, AorTech shall not in any manner disclose (except as required for financing), advertise, nor publish the existence of this Agreement nor the terms of transactions under this Agreement, which shall be considered as part of the confidential information.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
10.4 The term confidential information shall not include information which is in the public domain at the time of disclosure or afterward, except where such information becomes public due to a breach by the disclosing party of its obligations hereunder, nor shall the term confidential information in possession at the time of disclosure or which may be disclosed by third party having the right to disclose the same.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.

Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.

Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
In the event of a catastrophic loss, said insurance must cover the cost of replacing all Novoste equipment and fixtures at replacement value, Novoste purchased supplies and components, Novoste B.V. finished Products.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
Novoste equipment shall be covered by AorTech up to ONE MILLION U.S.

(and its respective directors, officers, employees and agents) harmless and upon request will defend the same against all actions, proceedings, claims, demands, losses, suits, outlays, damages, judgments, penalties or expenses of any kind or nature (including reasonable legal fees, other costs and amounts paid in settlement with AorTech's consent) which may be suffered by any of them arising out of any failure by AorTech to exercise reasonable care in carrying out the tasks specified in 1.2 of this Agreement.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
12.3 Each party shall give the other party prompt notice of any claim or suit relating to the subject matter of the indemnities granted in terms of this Clause 12.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
At the discretion of Novoste B.V., Novoste B.V. will assume the defense of any claim, demand or action against AorTech, however if shall upon written request by AorTech allow AorTech to participate in the defense thereof, such participation to be at the expense of AorTech.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.
13.0 DEFAULT 13.1 No failure or omission by either of the parties hereto in the performance of any obligation contained in this Agreement shall be deemed a breach hereof to the extent the same shall result from any cause beyond the control of such party, including, but not restricted to, acts of God, acts of local governments or any agency thereof, requests of any governmental authority or any officer, department, agency or instrumentality thereof, fire, storm, flood, earthquake, explosion, accident, acts of the public enemy, war, rebellion, insurrection, riot, sabotage, epidemic, quarantine, restrictions, strike, lockout, dispute with workmen, labor shortages, transportation embargoes, or failures or delays in the delivery of any transportation facility, Product or material necessary to the performance hereof.
Nonreturnable inventory will be charged and delivered to Novoste B.V.. a.

b. AorTech will use its best effort to minimize the impact of excess material and/or obsolete materials.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
AorTech will return materials to suppliers for credit, less restocking fees, when appropriate.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
AorTech will return materials to suppliers for credit, less restocking fees, when appropriate.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
AorTech will return materials to suppliers for credit, less restocking fees, when appropriate.

9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.

9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. All costs associated with the transfer of equipment, documentation, records or other Novoste B.V. assets shall be expensed to Novoste B.V.. 9.3 With reference to Section 13 of this Agreement, if any of the conditions listed in Section 13 of this Agreement should occur, and the result of such condition represents a breach of this Agreement, this Agreement will terminate.
Disposition of excess or obsolete materials will be coordinated with Novoste B.V. to minimize the impact of cost to Novoste B.V. where possible.

9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. All costs associated with the transfer of equipment, documentation, records or other Novoste B.V. assets shall be expensed to Novoste B.V.. 9.3 With reference to Section 13 of this Agreement, if any of the conditions listed in Section 13 of this Agreement should occur, and the result of such condition represents a breach of this Agreement, this Agreement will terminate.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
10.0 CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION AND ADVERTISING 10.1 AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall each maintain as confidential, and not to disclose to third parties or use for its own benefit, any specifications, drawings, blueprints, flow charts, reports, data, business information, trade secrets, manufacturing processes, or other confidential information of the other party which AorTech or Novoste B.V., as the case may be, learns or acquires by virtue of this Agreement, except that AorTech or Novoste B.V. may disclose confidential information pursuant to the order or requirement of a court, administrative agency, or other governmental body, and for disclosures required to be made by Novoste B.V. or its parent, Novoste Corporation, pursuant to United States Securities Law.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
AorTech and Novoste B.V. must notify the other party in writing of the need for such disclosure in advance of any such disclosure being made and AorTech and Novoste B.V. further agree to use reasonable efforts to protect the confidential information against disclosure to unauthorized persons.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
10.3 Without Novoste B.V.'s written consent, AorTech shall not in any manner disclose (except as required for financing), advertise, nor publish the existence of this Agreement nor the terms of transactions under this Agreement, which shall be considered as part of the confidential information.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.
10.4 The term confidential information shall not include information which is in the public domain at the time of disclosure or afterward, except where such information becomes public due to a breach by the disclosing party of its obligations hereunder, nor shall the term confidential information in possession at the time of disclosure or which may be disclosed by third party having the right to disclose the same.
5 5 4.2 AorTech shall immediately notify Novoste B.V. upon receipt of communication scheduling an inspection, excluding an inspection requested by Novoste B.V., stated above in Section 4.1.

12.0 INDEMNITES 12.1 Novoste B.V. shall at all times indemnify and hold AorTech (and its respective directors, officers, employees and agents) harmless and upon request will defend the same against all actions, proceedings, claims, demands, losses, suits, outlays, damages, judgments, penalties or expenses of any kind or nature (including reasonable legal fees, other costs and amounts paid in settlement 11 11 with Novoste B.V.'s consent) which may be suffered or incurred by any of them arising out of any defect in any Product or any part thereof ; 12.2 AorTech shall at all times indemnify and hold Novoste B.V. (and its respective directors, officers, employees and agents) harmless and upon request will defend the same against all actions, proceedings, claims, demands, losses, suits, outlays, damages, judgments, penalties or expenses of any kind or nature (including reasonable legal fees, other costs and amounts paid in settlement with AorTech's consent) which may be suffered by any of them arising out of any failure by AorTech to exercise reasonable care in carrying out the tasks specified in 1.2 of this Agreement.

6.0 PAYMENTS TO MANUFACTURER (AORTECH) 6.1 The initial price to be paid by Novoste B.V. to AorTech shall be calculated at the rate of $18 (United States currency) per hour (each such hour being referred to herein as a Direct Labor Assembly Hour) in respect of each hour or part of an hour which an AorTech employee shall devote to performing any of the following activities: manufacture of Novoste B.V.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $18 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $9) or $27 per hour.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.2 AorTech shall, in good faith, maintain written records (time sheets) for each individual assigned to work on Novoste B.V.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Product, whereby the number of hours worked, date work was performed, and name of individual performing the work shall be recorded.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
These records, as they apply to Novoste B.V.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Product, shall be made available to Novoste B.V. for review upon request.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.3 The price specified in clause 6.1 shall be increased annually with effect from the anniversary of the last date of execution hereof (a) in proportion to the increase (if any) in the Retail Prices Index published in the United Kingdom by the Department of Employment (or by any Government Department upon which its duties in connection with such Index shall have devolved) for the immediately preceding month of over that for the same month in 6 6 the preceding year, or (b) by 5% per annum, whichever shall be the higher.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.5 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech $5,000 (United States currency) per month for use of a class 100,000 cleanroom dedicated exclusively to manufacture the Product.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
In addition, the following services shall be included: a. the storage of materials within AorTech's warehouses area; this shall include up to 500 square feet of storage space.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.6 Novoste B.V. shall reimburse AorTech in respect of any capital expenditure necessarily incurred by AorTech with the prior Agreement of Novoste B.V., such Agreement not to be unreasonably withheld for the purpose of assembling the Product pursuant to this Agreement, including, without prejudice to the foregoing generality, any expenditure incurred in connection with the provision of new or additional cleanroom facilities.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
This amount shall not exceed $10,000 US dollars unless otherwise agreed by both parties in writing in advance.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.7 Novoste B.V. shall also pay to AorTech a fee of $30 US dollars, (together with all Value Added Tax payable thereon) in respect of each hour or part of an hour devoted by AorTech's senior technician.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Overtime shall be invoiced at the base rate of $30 per hour plus 50%, (over time premium) (or $15) or $45 per hour.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
6.8 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech a fifteen percent (15%) fee based on the actual cost of materials purchased by AorTech, where such materials are exclusiverly used to build Novoste Product per this agreement (fee is equal to 15% of actual material costs).
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
This incremental material cost shall cover any administrative, finance or other costs incurred by AorTech to purchase materials required to build Novoste Product per this agreement.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
This incremental material cost shall be invoiced on a separate line item from that of actual material cost.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
7.0 DELIVERY, LEAD TIME AND FLEXABILITY 7.1 AorTech shall arrange delivery of the Product to such destination as Novoste B.V. may designate in accordance with Clause 7.4.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
All freight costs relating to delivery of Product from AorTech's premises to their ultimate destination will be at the expense of Novoste B.V. and will be reimbursed by Novoste B.V. to AorTech within 30 days of a request for payment in writing by AorTech to Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. retains the right to approve the freight forwarder recommend by AorTech.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
7.2 Novoste B.V. will provide AorTech with a purchase order which shall state the Product part number, quantities and date required.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
AorTech shall use its best efforts to supplying the Product in accordance with Novoste B.V. required ship dates.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
8 8 7.3 Novoste B.V. shall pay for all transportation costs and any Value Added Tax as assigned in accordance with the terms in Clause 7.1.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
All transit insurance costs in respect of onward delivery of finished goods to Novoste B.V.'s customers, will be the passed on to Novoste B.V. by AorTech.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
7.4 Novoste B.V. may require that shipments of Product under this Agreement be shipped by AorTech directly to Novoste B.V. customers.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
These shipment locations will be specified by Novoste B.V.. 7.5 During the initial preProduction stage (defined as the stage where equipment installation, Product qualification, process validation take place, and initial shelf stock units are built), AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall work together to develop a price per unit cost which includes the cost, facility overhead, direct and indirect labor, and sterilization costs.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Upon developing a mutually agreed upon price per unit, this manufacturing Agreement will be amended to reflect such terms.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Until such time pricing shall remain as indicated in section 6 of this Agreement.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
8.0 TERM 8.1 Subject to prior termination as provided in Section 9.1 below, the initial term of this Agreement shall be from the date of execution of this agreement until March 31st, 2000.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
8.2 After the initial term of this Agreement, the duration of this Agreement shall thereafter automatically renew for an additional twelve month period except that either Novoste B.V. or AorTech may terminate the Agreement by giving ninety (90) days prior written notice of termination, such termination to be effective at the end of the relevant twelve month period.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
AorTech will complete the manufacture of any Products ordered by Novoste B.V. up to the termination date.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. All costs associated with the transfer of equipment, documentation, records or other Novoste B.V. assets shall be expensed to Novoste B.V.. 9.3 With reference to Section 13 of this Agreement, if any of the conditions listed in Section 13 of this Agreement should occur, and the result of such condition represents a breach of this Agreement, this Agreement will terminate.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
10.0 CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION AND ADVERTISING 10.1 AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall each maintain as confidential, and not to disclose to third parties or use for its own benefit, any specifications, drawings, blueprints, flow charts, reports, data, business information, trade secrets, manufacturing processes, or other confidential information of the other party which AorTech or Novoste B.V., as the case may be, learns or acquires by virtue of this Agreement, except that AorTech or Novoste B.V. may disclose confidential information pursuant to the order or requirement of a court, administrative agency, or other governmental body, and for disclosures required to be made by Novoste B.V. or its parent, Novoste Corporation, pursuant to United States Securities Law.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
AorTech and Novoste B.V. must notify the other party in writing of the need for such disclosure in advance of any such disclosure being made and AorTech and Novoste B.V. further agree to use reasonable efforts to protect the confidential information against disclosure to unauthorized persons.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
10.3 Without Novoste B.V.'s written consent, AorTech shall not in any manner disclose (except as required for financing), advertise, nor publish the existence of this Agreement nor the terms of transactions under this Agreement, which shall be considered as part of the confidential information.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
10.4 The term confidential information shall not include information which is in the public domain at the time of disclosure or afterward, except where such information becomes public due to a breach by the disclosing party of its obligations hereunder, nor shall the term confidential information in possession at the time of disclosure or which may be disclosed by third party having the right to disclose the same.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.

12.0 INDEMNITES 12.1 Novoste B.V. shall at all times indemnify and hold AorTech (and its respective directors, officers, employees and agents) harmless and upon request will defend the same against all actions, proceedings, claims, demands, losses, suits, outlays, damages, judgments, penalties or expenses of any kind or nature (including reasonable legal fees, other costs and amounts paid in settlement 11 11 with Novoste B.V.'s consent) which may be suffered or incurred by any of them arising out of any defect in any Product or any part thereof ; 12.2 AorTech shall at all times indemnify and hold Novoste B.V. (and its respective directors, officers, employees and agents) harmless and upon request will defend the same against all actions, proceedings, claims, demands, losses, suits, outlays, damages, judgments, penalties or expenses of any kind or nature (including reasonable legal fees, other costs and amounts paid in settlement with AorTech's consent) which may be suffered by any of them arising out of any failure by AorTech to exercise reasonable care in carrying out the tasks specified in 1.2 of this Agreement.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
12.3 Each party shall give the other party prompt notice of any claim or suit relating to the subject matter of the indemnities granted in terms of this Clause 12.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
At the discretion of Novoste B.V., Novoste B.V. will assume the defense of any claim, demand or action against AorTech, however if shall upon written request by AorTech allow AorTech to participate in the defense thereof, such participation to be at the expense of AorTech.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.
13.0 DEFAULT 13.1 No failure or omission by either of the parties hereto in the performance of any obligation contained in this Agreement shall be deemed a breach hereof to the extent the same shall result from any cause beyond the control of such party, including, but not restricted to, acts of God, acts of local governments or any agency thereof, requests of any governmental authority or any officer, department, agency or instrumentality thereof, fire, storm, flood, earthquake, explosion, accident, acts of the public enemy, war, rebellion, insurrection, riot, sabotage, epidemic, quarantine, restrictions, strike, lockout, dispute with workmen, labor shortages, transportation embargoes, or failures or delays in the delivery of any transportation facility, Product or material necessary to the performance hereof.
These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.

These meetings shall be held at minimum of four (4) times per year.

AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.

23.0 WARRANTY 23.1 Limited Warranty: AorTech warrants to Novoste B.V., for the shelf life of the Product as defined by Novoste specifications, which shall be a minimum of twenty four months from the date of sterilization, and a maximum of thirtysix months from the date of sterilization, that all Product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship, and shall conform to applicable specifications, drawings, samples and descriptions referred to in this Agreement.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.
23.2 AorTech shall rework or replace all defective Product (typically within 15 days of receipt) unless otherwise specified by Novoste B.V., at no cost to Novoste B.V.. All rework of finished Product must be approved in writing before starting any such rework by the Novoste B.V., Director of Quality Assurance.
AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.

AorTech will invoice Novoste B.V. monthly, at the end of each month, for payment of the cost associated with performing these activities in support of this Agreement.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
7.0 DELIVERY, LEAD TIME AND FLEXABILITY 7.1 AorTech shall arrange delivery of the Product to such destination as Novoste B.V. may designate in accordance with Clause 7.4.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
All freight costs relating to delivery of Product from AorTech's premises to their ultimate destination will be at the expense of Novoste B.V. and will be reimbursed by Novoste B.V. to AorTech within 30 days of a request for payment in writing by AorTech to Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. retains the right to approve the freight forwarder recommend by AorTech.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
7.2 Novoste B.V. will provide AorTech with a purchase order which shall state the Product part number, quantities and date required.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
AorTech shall use its best efforts to supplying the Product in accordance with Novoste B.V. required ship dates.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
8 8 7.3 Novoste B.V. shall pay for all transportation costs and any Value Added Tax as assigned in accordance with the terms in Clause 7.1.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
All transit insurance costs in respect of onward delivery of finished goods to Novoste B.V.'s customers, will be the passed on to Novoste B.V. by AorTech.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
7.4 Novoste B.V. may require that shipments of Product under this Agreement be shipped by AorTech directly to Novoste B.V. customers.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
These shipment locations will be specified by Novoste B.V.. 7.5 During the initial preProduction stage (defined as the stage where equipment installation, Product qualification, process validation take place, and initial shelf stock units are built), AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall work together to develop a price per unit cost which includes the cost, facility overhead, direct and indirect labor, and sterilization costs.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Upon developing a mutually agreed upon price per unit, this manufacturing Agreement will be amended to reflect such terms.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Until such time pricing shall remain as indicated in section 6 of this Agreement.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
AorTech will complete the manufacture of any Products ordered by Novoste B.V. up to the termination date.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
9.0 TERMINATION 9.1 Notwithstanding the term set forth in Section 8.1 above, this Agreement may be terminated prior to the expiration of the initial term (or any renewal term) as follows: a. AorTech shall have the option of terminating this Agreement immediately if Novoste B.V. fails to pay any amounts due and payable to AorTech in terms of this Agreement which remain due and unpaid for thirty (30) days after receiving written notices from AorTech that such amounts were unpaid, due and owing to AorTech.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
Should either party commit any material breach of this Agreement and fail to remedy the same within thirty (30) days after receipt of written notice to do so, the party giving notice shall by entitled forthwith to terminate this Agreement by a notice in writing, without prejudice to any claim for any damages or other relief arising out of such breach, and any waiver of any breach shall not be taken to a waiver of any subsequent breach.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
c. In case of the bankruptcy, appointment of a trustee, receiver of liquidator, assignment for the benefit of creditors or insolvency of either party, or in the event that either party liquidates its business, this Agreement shall terminate immediately.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
All tooling, equipment, inventory and documents shall be forwarded by AorTech to a destination specified by Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
AorTech and Novoste B.V. must notify the other party in writing of the need for such disclosure in advance of any such disclosure being made and AorTech and Novoste B.V. further agree to use reasonable efforts to protect the confidential information against disclosure to unauthorized persons.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
10.3 Without Novoste B.V.'s written consent, AorTech shall not in any manner disclose (except as required for financing), advertise, nor publish the existence of this Agreement nor the terms of transactions under this Agreement, which shall be considered as part of the confidential information.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.
10.4 The term confidential information shall not include information which is in the public domain at the time of disclosure or afterward, except where such information becomes public due to a breach by the disclosing party of its obligations hereunder, nor shall the term confidential information in possession at the time of disclosure or which may be disclosed by third party having the right to disclose the same.
Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Novoste B.V. will pay such invoices within thirty days of their being issued by AorTech.

Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
6.8 Novoste B.V. shall pay AorTech a fifteen percent (15%) fee based on the actual cost of materials purchased by AorTech, where such materials are exclusiverly used to build Novoste Product per this agreement (fee is equal to 15% of actual material costs).
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
This incremental material cost shall cover any administrative, finance or other costs incurred by AorTech to purchase materials required to build Novoste Product per this agreement.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
This incremental material cost shall be invoiced on a separate line item from that of actual material cost.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
7.0 DELIVERY, LEAD TIME AND FLEXABILITY 7.1 AorTech shall arrange delivery of the Product to such destination as Novoste B.V. may designate in accordance with Clause 7.4.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
All freight costs relating to delivery of Product from AorTech's premises to their ultimate destination will be at the expense of Novoste B.V. and will be reimbursed by Novoste B.V. to AorTech within 30 days of a request for payment in writing by AorTech to Novoste B.V.. Novoste B.V. retains the right to approve the freight forwarder recommend by AorTech.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
7.2 Novoste B.V. will provide AorTech with a purchase order which shall state the Product part number, quantities and date required.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
AorTech shall use its best efforts to supplying the Product in accordance with Novoste B.V. required ship dates.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
8 8 7.3 Novoste B.V. shall pay for all transportation costs and any Value Added Tax as assigned in accordance with the terms in Clause 7.1.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
All transit insurance costs in respect of onward delivery of finished goods to Novoste B.V.'s customers, will be the passed on to Novoste B.V. by AorTech.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
7.4 Novoste B.V. may require that shipments of Product under this Agreement be shipped by AorTech directly to Novoste B.V. customers.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
These shipment locations will be specified by Novoste B.V.. 7.5 During the initial preProduction stage (defined as the stage where equipment installation, Product qualification, process validation take place, and initial shelf stock units are built), AorTech and Novoste B.V. shall work together to develop a price per unit cost which includes the cost, facility overhead, direct and indirect labor, and sterilization costs.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Upon developing a mutually agreed upon price per unit, this manufacturing Agreement will be amended to reflect such terms.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
Until such time pricing shall remain as indicated in section 6 of this Agreement.
Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.

Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.

Overtime shall be defined as the number of hours worked beyond the normal work week.
AorTech will complete the manufacture of any Products ordered by Novoste B.V. up to the termination date.
